name: Suspicious IO.FileStream
description: Open a handle on the drive volume via the \\.\ DOS device path specifier and perform direct access read of the first few bytes of the volume.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-Object* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*IO.FileStream* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\\\\.\\\*)`
